FROM mhart/alpine-node:4 
MAINTAINER Chris.Gross <cgHome@gmx.net> 

ENV HOME=/home 
WORKDIR $HOME/ 

# Install Global NPM Modules 
RUN npm install -g concurrently lite-server && npm cache clean --force;

# Clearing Nodeâ€™s NPM Cache 
RUN rm -rf ~/.npm && \
 npm cache clear --force

VOLUME ${HOME} 
EXPOSE 8080 
CMD npm start
